title: Digital Control Systems
description: Theory and applications of digital computers in linear control systems. Discrete time methods are used in analysis and design studies. Digital control systems are synthesized. 3 lectures. Crosslisted as CPE/EEÂ 432.
corequisites: Prior background in discrete time systems, for example EE 328, EE 368
recommended: Prior background in discrete time systems, for example EE 328, EE 368
